scripts.dev:clean: if (Test-Path .next) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next }; if (Test-Path node_modules\.cache) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules\.cache }; next dev
scripts.clean: if (Test-Path .next) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; if (Test-Path node_modules\.cache) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules\.cache -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }
scripts.clean:full: if (Test-Path .next) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; if (Test-Path node_modules\.cache) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules\.cache -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; npm run build; npm run start
scripts.clean:deploy: if (Test-Path .next) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; if (Test-Path node_modules\.cache) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules\.cache -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; npm run build
